info.title: Security Example API
info.description: This API demonstrates the use of the goa security DSL

get.description:
This action is secured with the jwt scheme

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `api:read`

parameters.name: fail
parameters.description: Whether to force auth failure even with a valid JWT

put.description:
This action is secured with the jwt scheme and also requires an API key query string.

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `api:read`
  * `api:write`

**Required security scopes for api_key**:
  * `api:read`
  * `api:write`

post.description:
This action is secured with the jwt scheme and also requires an API key header.

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `api:read`
  * `api:write`

**Required security scopes for api_key**:
  * `api:read`
  * `api:write`

**Required security scopes for basic**:
  * `api:read`
  * `api:write`

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth security using Basic scheme (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7617)

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth security using Basic scheme (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7617)

api_key_query_k.description: Secures endpoint by requiring an API key.
api_key_query_k.name: k

basic_header_Authorization.description:
Basic authentication used to authenticate security principal during signin

**Security Scopes**:
  * `api:read`: Read-only access

jwt_header_Authorization.description:
Secures endpoint by requiring a valid JWT token retrieved via the signin endpoint. Supports scopes "api:read" and "api:write".

**Security Scopes**:
  * `api:read`: Read-only access
  * `api:write`: Read and write access
jwt_header_Authorization.name: Authorization

jwt_header_X-Authorization.description:
Secures endpoint by requiring a valid JWT token retrieved via the signin endpoint. Supports scopes "api:read" and "api:write".

**Security Scopes**:
  * `api:read`: Read-only access
  * `api:write`: Read and write access
jwt_header_X-Authorization.name: X-Authorization

oauth2_query_oauth.description: Secures endpoint by requiring a valid OAuth2 token retrieved via the signin endpoint. Supports scopes "api:read" and "api:write".
